product_detail: LG 11.5Kg Semi Automatic Top Load Washing Machine, Roller Jet Pulsator + Soak, Burgundy

discription.Key_Features: Wind Jet Dry Reduces remaining moisture on laundry and inside of washing machine by Spin tub rotating at high RPM, air comes into the tub and is circulated inside which removes water. Circulation of air through air vents dries clothes.
discription.Additional_Features: Auto Restart allows the program to restart all by itself in case of power failure. It resumes from stage where it stopped, however, the wash cycle time may vary.
discription.Wash Programs: The machine’s unique soak process soaks clothes in a concentrated detergent solution to help loosen tough dirt particles.

product_detail: LG 7Kg Semi Automatic Top Load Washing Machine, Rat Away Technology, Dark Gray

discription.Key_Features: The machine has 3 different wash programs(Gentle, Normal, Strong) ensuring a safe and customized wash for every fabric type.
discription.Additional_Features: The lint filter collects the lint which come out while washing clothes. The fabric thus do not get stuck in the pipe, thus gives a better washing performance.
discription.Wash Programs: Its unique collar scrubber helps you scrub cuffs and collars, saving your time and efforts.
